MESSAGE.value: -mrr expansion rate analysis important logics

-net revenue retention analysis -important SQL techniques/logics used: 1: cross join in making CTE tables and left join in the select statement. 2: the where condition in cross joins to select only active subscriptions at each time point.
-minor change: column name change
-addition of having clause in CTE tables
-grr analysis: stopped due to limitation in data accuracy

Create SQL views for 5 core SaaS metrics to integrate to Power BI
- vw_mrr_growth: Monthly recurring revenue trend - vw_arpa: Average revenue per account - vw_subscription_churn_rate: Subscription churn rate analysis - vw_expansion_mrr_rate: analyzes revenue added from existing customers - vw_nrr: Net revenue retention analysis

-fix in expansion mrr query: date format fix (in accordance with other queries. easier to deal with in Power BI environment
- addition of mrr contraction rate
- minor change: wrapped last_month_mrr column with coalesce function
-minor change in variable name
-data boundary handling
-consistency of coalesce function use in nrr_rate calculation
-elimination of concat function when calculating percentage figures for easier data handling in Power BI environment
-undid the multiplication of 100 in calculation of ratios for easier data handling in Power BI environment
-undid multipllication of 100. -applied ifnull functions to prevent N/A values in Power BI
-Increased decimal precision for percentage metrics
-opted out churned accounts in calcuation of contraction_mrr
-change in expansion_mrr query: added 'flag' column to use it to filter country and referral_source in power BI environment.
-made and worked on power BI dashboard file.
-added CTE table in expansion_mrr sql file to express expansion mrr value by country in power BI. changed the corresponding power BI table accordingly

added footnote to nrr query.
removed coalesce function in the select statement,because it is not possible for cohort_mrr or current_mrr to be zero because of the having clauses in the CTE tables.
added comments to queries for easier understanding of the logic
-added a card showing contraction rate in Power BI -designed overall layout of the Readme file
Remove exploratory queries from SQL files
-filled out the README file summarizing the project
- added image files to attach to the README file.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - added image files to attach to the README file.
